purpleculture_info: Pictophonetic: 皮 indicates the sound; 土 (earth) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:
新加坡 [ xīn jiā pō ]: Singapore
山坡 [ shān pō ]: hillside
滑坡 [ huá pō ]: rockslide; landslip; landslide; mudslide; fig. slump; downturn; to decline
吉隆坡 [ jí lóng pō ]: Kuala Lumpur, capital of Malaysia
斜坡 [ xié pō ]: slope; incline

heisig_chinese_memo: The soil covering the slope makes it great land for growing plants or farming despite its orientation.
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: The soil covering the slope makes it great land for growing plants or farming despite its orientation.
humanum_full_description_en:
From " earth " to " skin " sound. The Chu characters of the Warring States Period also have a glyph from "立". The original meaning is slope, that is, inclined terrain. "Said Wen": "Po, Hanya. From the soil, the sound of the skin." As shown in the picture of Zhongshan Wang Zhaoyu: "The Qiu Ping is fifty feet, and the slope is fifty feet." "Later Han Shu. "The Biography of Deng Zhang Xu Zhang Hu": "There is Puyang Po on the northern boundary of Xu County, which is surrounded by many fertile fields, and the waste is not repaired." Wei Yingwu of the Tang Dynasty (Yeju): "Raise the rabbit to the hillside, and the fishing margin is red. "

" Po " was also the common name for Hanlin scholars in the Tang and Song Dynasties. The Southern Song Dynasty Ye Mengde "Shi Lin Yan Yu. Volume 5: "It is commonly known as Poe for Hanlin Scholars. When Dezong of the Tang Dynasty moved the Academy to Jinluangpo, it was also called Luangpo." It also refers to Hanlin Academy as "Jinpo". For example, Wang Anshi of the Northern Song Dynasty, "The paintings of Hui Chong, a monk from Chunfu, want to compose a poem": "Jinpo's Juran Mountains are blocked, and the ink and ink are so full. Haoliang and Cui Bai are also good at painting, and once saw peach blossoms quiet and early vomiting."
humanum_short_description_en: From " earth " to " skin " sound. The original meaning is slope, that is, inclined terrain.
humanum_full_description:
從「土」，「皮」聲。戰國楚系文字亦有從「立」的字形。本義是斜坡，即傾斜的地形。《說文》：「坡，阪也。从土，皮聲。」如中山王兆域圖：「丘平者五十尺，其坡五十尺。」《後漢書．鄧張徐張胡列傳》：「徐縣北界有蒲陽坡，傍多良田，而堙廢莫修。」唐代韋應物〈野居〉：「逐兔上坡岡，捕魚緣赤澗。」

　　「坡」也是唐宋時期對翰林學士的俗稱。南宋葉夢得《石林燕語．卷五》：「俗稱翰林學士為坡，蓋唐德宗時嘗移學士院於金鑾坡上，故亦稱鑾坡。」又以「金坡」借指翰林院。如北宋王安石〈純甫出僧惠崇畫要予作詩〉：「金坡巨然山數堵，粉墨空多真漫與；濠梁崔白亦善畫，曾見桃花靜初吐。」
humanum_short_description: 從「土」，「皮」聲。本義是斜坡，即傾斜的地形。

Chinese Definition:
Pictophonetic: 皮 indicates the sound; 土 (earth) conveys the meaning.
HSK: 6
Freq: 1550
Chinese: The soil covering the slope makes it great land for growing plants or farming despite its orientation.
Meaning: slope
Story: The soil covering the slope makes it great land for growing plants or farming despite its orientation.
Kind: both

從「 土 」，「 皮 」聲。戰國楚系文字亦有從「 立 」的字形。本義是斜坡，即傾斜的地形。《說文》：「坡，阪也。从土，皮聲。」如中山王兆域圖：「丘平者五十尺，其坡五十尺。」《後漢書．鄧張徐張胡列傳》：「徐縣北界有蒲陽坡，傍多良田，而堙廢莫修。」唐代韋應物〈野居〉：「逐兔上坡岡，捕魚緣赤澗。」 「 坡 」也是唐宋時期對翰林學士的俗稱。南宋葉夢得《石林燕語．卷五》：「俗稱翰林學士為坡，蓋唐德宗時嘗移學士院於金鑾坡上，故亦稱鑾坡。」又以「金坡」借指翰林院。如北宋王安石〈純甫出僧惠崇畫要予作詩〉：「金坡巨然山數堵，粉墨空多真漫與；濠梁崔白亦善畫，曾見桃花靜初吐。」
From " earth" to " skin" sound. The Chu characters of the Warring States Period also have a glyph from " 立". The original meaning is slope, that is, inclined terrain. "Said Wen": "Po, Hanya. From the soil, the sound of the skin." As shown in the picture of Zhongshan Wang Zhaoyu: "The Qiu Ping is fifty feet, and the slope is fifty feet." "Later Han Shu. "The Biography of Deng Zhang Xu Zhang Hu": "There is Puyang Po on the northern boundary of Xu County, which is surrounded by many fertile fields, and the waste is not repaired." Wei Yingwu of the Tang Dynasty (Yeju): "Raise the rabbit to the hillside, and the fishing margin is red. " " Po" was also the common name for Hanlin scholars in the Tang and Song Dynasties. The Southern Song Dynasty Ye Mengde "Shi Lin Yan Yu. Volume 5: "It is commonly known as Poe for Hanlin Scholars. When Dezong of the Tang Dynasty moved the Academy to Jinluangpo, it was also called Luangpo." It also refers to Hanlin Academy as "Jinpo". For example, Wang Anshi of the Northern Song Dynasty, "The paintings of Hui Chong, a monk from Chunfu, want to compose a poem": "Jinpo's Juran Mountains are blocked, and the ink and ink are so full. Haoliang and Cui Bai are also good at painting, and once saw peach blossoms quiet and early vomiting."

坡字的基本解释

坡
pō
倾斜的地方：山坡。下坡。
倾斜：坡道。坡降（ji刵g ）（ａ．坡；ｂ．坡度）。

坡字的汉语字典释义

[①]［pō］
［《廣韻》滂禾切，平戈，滂。］
亦作“岥2”。
(1)山的倾斜面。
(2)平原；原野。
(3)北方亦指田地。
(4)倾斜。
(5)指倾斜度低。

坡字的英文翻译

◎ 坡
slope, sloping

坡字的康熙字典解释

【丑集中】【土字部】　坡； 康熙笔画：8； 页码：页226第11
【唐韻】【集韻】【韻會】滂禾切【正韻】普禾切，?破平聲。【說文】阪也。滇俗稱山嶺曰長坡，其岥岮高峻者曰相見坡。【唐書·翰林志】德宗移學士院於金鑾坡。　又飛坡。【朝野僉載】晉元帝永昌中，秦州敷水店西坡，白日飛四五里，直塞赤水坡上，桑畦麥隴，依然不動。　又【集韻】彼義切，音賁。義同。

坡字的源字形

坡字的起名意思

：指角度，坡度；也指地方，如山坡。

склон
Пиктофонетические символы.
Значение почвы означает, что склон наклонен; скин (пи) означает звук, а скин означает поверхность и поверхностный слой, что означает, что поверхность местности наклонная.
Первоначальное значение - склон холма.
①Место с уклоном местности: горы ~ "почва ~ | крутые ~. ②Наклон: ~ градус.
